allow:
Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.5.2/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
setwd\(''tests/testthat''\)
source\(''../../postSim.R''\)
source\(''../../post.R''\)
# Now run tests with source\(\) calls expected to find files in cwd â€” 
# we''ll just inline-run the test logic instead
library\(testthat\)

# Test 1: holds preserves non-numeric types for glm models
test_that\(''holds preserves non-numeric types for glm models'', {
  d <- mtcars
  d$am_f <- factor\(ifelse\(d$am == 1, ''manual'', ''auto''\)\)
  fit <- glm\(vs ~ am_f + wt, data = d, family = binomial\(\)\)
  set.seed\(1\)
  res <- post\(fit, holds = list\(am_f = ''manual''\), n.sims = 50, digits = 6\)
  expect_s4_class\(res, ''post''\)
  expect_false\(any\(is.na\(res@est\)\)\)
}\)

# Test 2: post rejects silently recycled glm weights
test_that\(''post rejects silently recycled glm weights'', {
  fit <- glm\(vs ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars, family = binomial\(\)\)
  expect_error\(
    post\(fit, weights = rep\(1, 2\), n.sims = 20\),
    ''weights must have the same length as the estimation sample''
  \)
}\)

# Test 3: post rejects silently recycled polr weights
test_that\(''post rejects silently recycled polr weights'', {
  skip_if_not_installed\(''MASS''\)
  d <- transform\(mtcars, gear_f = ordered\(gear\)\)
  fit <- MASS::polr\(gear_f ~ wt + hp, data = d, method = ''logistic''\)
  expect_error\(
    post\(fit, weights = rep\(1, 3\), n.sims = 20\),
    ''weights must have the same length as the estimation sample''
  \)
}\)
")
